6.2. block Macro

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block filter [; params]

The arguments are:

Name Type Default Rule
filter filter    
params rest _NULL_  

See Understanding Macro Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The block macro marks the beginning of a "block" of text. The block is ended by the endblock macro.

Examples
